switchy.modules.switchy.apoli.descriptio: A module that switches power data from Apace's Apoli.
switchy.modules.switchy.apoli.enabled: Power data will be saved alongside each presets' origins.
switchy.modules.switchy.apoli.disabled: Powers will be created fresh when switching presets with different origins.
switchy.modules.switchy.apoli.warning: All power data (resources, extra inventory, etc.) for other presets' origins will be dropped/lost!
switchy.modules.switchy.drogtor.descript: A module that switches nicknames from unascribed's Drogtor The Nickinator.
switchy.modules.switchy.drogtor.enabled: You will be able to set nicknames per-preset.
switchy.modules.switchy.drogtor.disabled: You will share a single nickname across all presets.
switchy.modules.switchy.drogtor.warning: All other nicknames will be cleared!
switchy.modules.switchy.hidearmor.descri: A module that switches hidden armor from unascribed's Fabrication's /hidearmor.
switchy.modules.switchy.hidearmor.disabl: /hidearmor will change armor visibility for all presets.
switchy.modules.switchy.hidearmor.warnin: All other /hidearmor settings will be cleared!
switchy.modules.switchy.fabrictailor.des: A module that switches player skins from samolego's Fabric Tailor.
switchy.modules.switchy.fabrictailor.ena: You will be able to set a skin per-preset.
switchy.modules.switchy.fabrictailor.dis: You will share a single skin across all presets.
switchy.modules.switchy.fabrictailor.war: All other overridden skins will be cleared!
switchy.modules.switchy.origins.descript: A module that switches layered Origins from Apace's Origins.
switchy.modules.switchy.origins.enabled: You will be able to have an origin (or layered set) for each preset. BYO Orbs of Origin.
switchy.modules.switchy.origins.disabled: You will share one set of origins across all presets.
switchy.modules.switchy.origins.warning: All other sets of origins will be lost!
switchy.modules.switchy.pehkui.descripti: A module that switches scale values (e.g. sizes) from Virtuoel's Pehkui.
switchy.modules.switchy.pehkui.enabled: Scale changes will apply only to the current preset.
switchy.modules.switchy.pehkui.disabled: Scale changes will apply regardless of the current preset.
switchy.modules.switchy.pehkui.warning: All other scale values wil be cleared!
switchy.modules.switchy.styled_nicknames: A module that switches nicknames from Patbox's Styled Nicknames.
You will be able to set nicknames per-preset.
You will share a single nickname across all presets.
All other nicknames will be cleared!
switchy.modules.switchy.arcpocalypse.des: A module that switches nekoarc state contents from Arathain's Arcpocalypse.
switchy.modules.switchy.arcpocalypse.ena: You will have your neco-arc transformation contained to each preset.
switchy.modules.switchy.arcpocalypse.dis: Neco-arc transformations will apply to all presets.
switchy.modules.switchy.arcpocalypse.war: All other neco-arc transformations (or lack thereof) will be cleared!
switchy.modules.switchy.hexcasting.descr: A module that switches the internalized pigment from petrak@'s Hex Casting.
switchy.modules.switchy.hexcasting.enabl: You will have one internalized pigment per-preset.
switchy.modules.switchy.hexcasting.disab: You will share a single internalized pigment over all presets.
switchy.modules.switchy.hexcasting.warni: All other pigments will be cleared!
switchy.modules.switchy.lanyard.descript: A module that switches lanyard contents from Pyrrha's Lanyard.
switchy.modules.switchy.lanyard.enabled: You will have individual lanyard contents per-preset.
switchy.modules.switchy.lanyard.disabled: You will have the same lanyard contents on all presets.
switchy.modules.switchy.lanyard.warning: All other lanyard contents will be cleared!
